item.title: Usage of Local Php Security Checker for Drupal Applications
item.description: In this article, we are going to see how the Local PHP Security Checker library will make people's lives easier during the development & code review process. To make developer life easier, developers look for tools or libraries which can automated security review. item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
